name: fairy-wind
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.
